name: Blocky Skies
description:
Short breakout-style game with a modernized retro style,
play across 32 different levels, defeat 8 bosses and beat the 4 bonus levels to become a complete block master!

This game does have:
32 levels in 8 different locations
8 unique bosses
4 bonus levels
In-game Achievements
4:3 Aspect
3 available resolutions (256x192, 512x384, 1024x768)
Borderless Fullscreen
